channel.title: Help needed!
channel.description:
npc drops: how can i do so that one item is usual drop and the other one is rarer?
summoning: how can i change summoning for only admins skill?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 01:26:35 PM[/size][hr]2 more questions: 1. how and where can i change the logout message? 2. why can't i use magic att spells, server says that THIS SPELL IS DISABLED?

item.title: Help needed!
item.dc:creator: @money67 money67
item.description:
@money67 wrote:

[quote=“new1, post:1, topic:44321”][br][size=1]Posted on: January 04, 2007, 01:26:35 PM[/size][hr]2 more questions:

  1. how and where can i change the logout message?[/quote]

In your client.java search for /*END OF DROP*/

You should see something like this below: sendQuest("Thanks for playing!", 2450); sendQuest("We hope you come back..", 2451); sendQuest("Click below to logout!", 2452);
Change those messages to your choice.

To change the Actual logout button search for public static final int packetSizes[] = {
Look above that and you will see something similar to this: sendFrame126("Click here, Logout..", 2458);

Change the words “Click here, Logout…” to your choice of words to change the actual logg out button.

Save then compile

Read full topic
